name: Flowers (attahh)
description:
Flowers | GMTK Game Jam 2021

Create Flower Arrangements for your Flower Shop. Express your creativity with this relaxing game where you can create your own Pastel Illustrations.

Controls

  • Mouse: Left Mouse Button to Click & Drag
  • iPad: Tap & Drag

👉 Full Screen and Sound Recommended

Game created by Andreia and Colombo for GTMK Game Jam 2021 with the theme "Joined Together".

If you feel like it, share your creations on Twitter and tag me @andreia_mfg

- Thanks for playing
